channel.title: Potential User Submission - iCreatedHorror
channel.description:
This is an indirect user submission from the forum member [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=383061]iCreatedHorror[/url]. He runs a blog by the name of [url=http://www.intelliforums.com/]IntelliForums[/url]. He has some rather interesting blog topics such as his pet peeves, so I thought that with some discussion involved we could possibly include one of his blog posts in the next edition.
Some of his blog posts:
[ul][li]http://intelliforums.com/blog/annoying-relationship-more/[/li] [li]http://intelliforums.com/blog/elitists-the-people-we-cannot-stand-online/[/li] [li]http://intelliforums.com/blog/lets-capitalize-the-first-letter-of-every-word/[/li] [li]http://intelliforums.com/blog/pet-peeve-grammar/[/li] [li]http://intelliforums.com/blog/gamers-sigh/[/li][/ul]

item.title: Potential User Submission - iCreatedHorror
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I really don’t think we should be using posts written for other blogs. If someone sees the same on each, it’ll just make us look lazy.

Read full topic

item.title: Potential User Submission - iCreatedHorror
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Tom:

zzzz

I plan to incorporate at least one user submission this month. It is already the 16th and I don’t have a single submission from any people, except from iCreatedHorror who gave me permission to use one of his blog posts if we decide to.

Read full topic
